com.magknight.mathutils

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magknight.mathutils.Geometry

  • public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class encompassing various useful geometry algorithms.
    Since:
    5/19/2020
    Author:
    Omar Alam and Cian Mc Sweeney

      • getClosest

        public static Vector2 getClosest(Vector2 origin,
                                 Vector2 point1,
                                 Vector2 point2)
        Calculates the closest vector from the origin point used as the reference.
        Parameters:
        origin - reference point to calculate distances from
        point1 - first point for comparison
        point2 - second point for comparison
        Returns:
        Vector2 closest point by distance.

      • subtractAngleCircle

                                         double subtraction)
        Subtracts a given angle from an initial starting angle on a circle
        Parameters:
        start - initial angle
        subtraction - angle to subtract from start
        Returns:
        double new angle (0-359) after subtraction

        Adds a given angle to an initial starting angle on a circle

        Returns:

      • getBearingDifference

        public static double getBearingDifference(double b1,
                                          double b2)
        Calculates difference between two bearings
        Parameters:
        b1 - first bearing
        b2 - second bearing
        Returns:
        double difference between two bearings in range (-360 to 360) depending on order of b1 and b2.

        line2 - second line
